name: The Arachnid - Island Of Spiders
description:
The Arachnid

     Your daughter Sally and her brother Sam went to  a camp to spend the summer time with their friends. But you knew that the camp they were  going to stay, was a creepy place. You warned them not to go there. But, they didn't listen. They wanted to go there so badly, so they ignored your advice and left. At first, everything was okay. But, after few days, her calls and messages suddenly stopped. You was so worried about them, so you went to the campsite check on them. But, you couldn't find them. After searching for a while, you found out that all of them got killed by a giant MONSTER !!! You were so angry, and wanted to avenge them. You planned to KILL the MONSTER ...!?
